subject: Tennis
United States Open (Tennis)
lead_paragraph: As the last major tournament, the U.S. Open is the perfect stage for transition, and all eyes will be on Rafael Nadal’s move to No. 1 after Roger Federer’s 237-week reign at the top.
snippet: As the last major tournament, the U.S. Open is the perfect stage for transition, and all eyes will be on Rafael Nadal’s move to No. 1 after Roger Federer’s 237-week reign at the top.
